channel.title: Should i go to west point?
channel.description: I have the grades and physical condition but all of my friends are where I live now, i want suggestions.

item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Bowser jr:

honourable war

Wat

You can’t fight an honorable war dipshit, no war is honorable. They’re all atrocities.

item.source: Should i go to west point?

item.title: Should i go to west point?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

DaGamerChild:

You don’t have to be invaded to fight a reasonable war. And weren’t we technically invaded in WW2? Pearl Harbor?

WWII is a war with so many mistakes from both the Allies and Axis. If US, USSR, UK and France had worked together we wouldn’t have seen as big of an disaster. But they didn’t. So I won’t really give anyone much praise for the war effort. Everyone just responded when the Axis-force hit them.

But except for WWII, which near everyone except for Switzerland, Sweden and Spain joined, what honourable war did US fight?

Read full topic

item.title: Should i go to west point?
item.dc:creator: @DaGamerChild DaGamerChild
item.description:
@DaGamerChild wrote:

It is no doubt, you did a good job against the British in 1775 and 1812, do you have any other examples of defending your country from bad guys?

DAFUQ? YOU THINK ALL THE US DID WAS FIGHT THE BRITISH?

-WWI
-WWII
-Korea
-Desert Storm

Read full topic
item.source: Should i go to west point?

item.title: Should i go to west point?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:16, topic:478552”][quote author=Newty link=topic=596779.msg4204236#msg4204236 date=1358668594]
Thanks casey ^

@Bowser, you don’t really believe we (the us military) are all ‘facists’ do you? I listen to the orders of the people appointed over me; but if I think something is wrong I have the means and the right to say no. Just because you disagree with the wars we are in(suprise: so do a majority of soldiers) doesn’t make us all bad guys. Nor does it make joining the military a bad career move for someone looking for a way to move up.
[/quote]
It makes you the bad guys when you sign up for it. You know what the military does, you know that it weakens national security in its operations overseas.

casey.:
It is no doubt, you did a good job against the British in 1775 and 1812, do you have any other examples of defending your country from bad guys?

"We have members on this site who are currently enlisted and I’m sure everyone has a family or friendship tie to someone in the military and will agree on this. "
If they don’t want their sons and daughters home in caskets, they should stop sending them into
meaningless danger.

There is no need for more people into the military. So you cannot argue that you protect your country by joining.[/quote]
You do know the military is a very valid and common career choice? Most people don’t even go in to actually fight (computers/IT, science, engineering, translation, etcetcetc), but when dumbass politicians start shit they endup being sent over there. We support them out of respect, they don’t want to actually be there.

casey.:
It is no doubt, you did a good job against the British in 1775 and 1812, do you have any other examples of defending your country from bad guys?

World war II would have eventually landed on us, Hitler had plans for Japan to invade the westcoast and Germany to invade the east coast IIRC, Pearl Harbor was to provoke us into going overseas so the US would have less defense.

Then all the shitty wars against communism

And now its just against extremists but obviously that doesn’t work

Read full topic
item.source: Should i go to west point?

item.title: Should i go to west point?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

@Bowser and Random

I refuse to let anyone ever insult our military. We can all agree that the US expresses some fascistic commonalities, but at the end of the day, soldiers are still fighting to represent and protect our past and present soldiers and civilians and ideals. Of course you can bring in the argument of “What is the point of pride in nationality” but the military is still representing our countries roots.

We have members on this site who are currently enlisted and I’m sure everyone has a family or friendship tie to someone in the military and will agree on this. We support the men and women defending and representing the true values of America, not the puppets and puppeteers who tell them what to do.

Read full topic
item.source: Should i go to west point?

item.title: Should i go to west point?
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:2, topic:478552”]Do you mean: “United States Military Academy”?

Then [size=36pt]NO[/size]. You should be banned for supporting your fascist military.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Should i go to west point?

item.title: Should i go to west point?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I applied for the Naval Academy but didn’t get in(kind of obvious because I’m not exactly the perfect model of what a representative wants to see in the interview, I just act as myself)

But anyhow, why not?
Granted you have to serve time back to the military for your education, you are guaranteed a job and 2nd level rank upon graduation.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“no1toldme2, post:9, topic:478552”][quote author=Newty link=topic=596779.msg4202113#msg4202113 date=1358369846]
How well do you deal with real dicipline?
[/quote]
Very well, I’ve been talking to people who went to West Point for their experiences.[/quote]

I’ll just say that being in the military isn’t as easy as some people make it out to be. Be ready for the toughest experience of your life.

Read full topic
